Text:
Application accepts serial the first time you open it, but then on the second time you have to register again ?? I have tried this numerous times using different serials from the keygen, but it will only accept the first time you open and then you have to re-register each time. 
Any suggestions?
Thanks!
Down load the previous version 6.0.7 and it will already be cracked.

Thanks, but unfortunately I am running Lion 10.7.3 and v 6.0.7 won't work with this version of Lion. 

Any other suggestions for getting a working serial for  v 6.0.9?
